title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Clinical Reasoning Competency Development Course Based on Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic medical terminology and patient assessment procedures
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can complete eight or more simulation scenarios—structured from simple to complex—with over 80% accuracy
Learners can explain a three-step process (patient symptom assessment → diagnostic reasoning → intervention planning) within 15 minutes after simulation
Learners can meet evaluation criteria of 70+ points by writing actual clinical case analysis reports in team-based projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
